function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Displaying COVID-19 spread information without real-time updates could lead to misinformation and outdated data.","Impact":"Misinformation may cause people to underestimate the risk and take inadequate precautions, leading to further spread of the disease.","Mitigation":"Implement real-time data updates and ensure that the information displayed is current and accurate.","Technologies":"Geographic Information System (GIS) with real-time data integration.","People":"General public, healthcare professionals, government authorities.","Owner":"Developers, data managers, government authorities."},{"Description":"Testing the application with a small number of respondents may not represent the diversity of user experiences and needs.","Impact":"The application may be optimized for a narrow range of users, leading to poor usability for others.","Mitigation":"Conduct user testing with a diverse group of respondents to capture a wide range of user experiences and feedback.","Technologies":"User testing platforms, survey tools, demographic analysis.","People":"Application users, developers, UX designers.","Owner":"User experience team, developers, product managers."},{"Description":"Verifying the validity of the expert system without considering real-world medical scenarios may result in inaccurate and unreliable early detection results.","Impact":"Inaccurate early detection results may lead to misdiagnosis and improper medical advice for patients.","Mitigation":"Conduct validation tests using real-world medical scenarios and diverse patient profiles to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the expert system.","Technologies":"Expert system validation tools, real-world medical scenario database.","People":"Medical professionals, patients, developers.","Owner":"Expert system development team, medical professionals, researchers."}]}
